name: Emma Frost (X-Men) LoRA [Reupload]
description:
Reupload of my Emma Frost LoRA

Best used at 0.6 - 1 strength. Activation tag is "Emma_Frost" followed by either "corset" or midriff" and any following combination of "gloves, cape, thigh highs, pants, shirt dress, fur trim" etc that you want. She is a fashionable mutant so her outfit is pretty customizable.

If you want the cape to extend from her corset/midriff like it does in her design, adding "exposed shoulders" helps.

Also thinking of adding her diamond form in the future if I can figure it out.

This Lora was made purely for a fun and self-learning experiences. I DID NOT INTEND and DO NOT give permissions for this LoRA to be used for any commercial/promotional/financial gain uses.
